Experience.title: Testing And Software Engineer, Summer Intern
Experience.description:
• Maintained regression test routine, including improved testing scrips, added new test cases, and updated baselines from different operating systems.
• Improved code coverage rate from 30% to 72% by tripling the number of tests to cover more code branches and detecting more than 200+ lines of dead codes from team project.
• Helped migrating team project’s build from gcc to Intel compiler icc/icpc. Managed all c++ third-party libraries by using Conan, adapted cross-building strategy and solved in-capabilities among packages from different compiler.
• Provided QA for team project’s new updates and supported c++ documentation through doxygen, breathe, exhale and sphinx.
